pageContext.claim: “Early this year Harley-Davidson said they would move much of their plant operations in Kansas City to Thailand. That was long before Tariffs were announced. Hence, they were just using Tariffs/Trade War as an excuse. Shows how unbalanced & unfair trade is.”
pageContext.analysis: In a public filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the company said European tariffs on its motorcycles, made in response to Trump's tariffs, had increased to 31 percent from 6 percent, adding, on average, $2,200 to every motorcycle exported from the United States to Europe.
